DOC.brief_summary: This study carry see Dapagliflozin addition insulin effective safe treat patient type 2 diabetes compare placebo ( identical look inactive treatment ) addition insulin
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Dapagliflozin , Added Therapy Patients With Type 2 Diabetes With Inadequate Glycemic Control Insulin
DOC.criteria: Type 2 Diabetes Patients HbA1c ≥7.5 % ≤10.5 % stable insulin regimen least 30 IU injectable insulin per day either without oral antidiabetic drug stable dose oral antidiabetic drug Type 1 Diabetes Treatment two additional oral antidiabetic drug Moderate severe renal ( kidney ) failure dysfunction
